a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Arable land is defined by the FAO as land under temporary crops, temporary meadows for mowing or for pasture,
land under market or kitchen gardens, and land temporarily fallow. It is measured in hectares per person.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
